text: 2.15: FG 2.23; 3.15; 7.52; 9.23; 9.29; 13.45; 13.50; 14.2; 14.5; 14.19; 17.5; 17.13; 18.12Zudaiŋ, mbe nza Bakɨme Zisas shogim, ana rimgim, mbe vhɨra Fhe Bakɨmen kamthooŋ gumgi, mbe vhɨra mbe shogim, mbe vhɨzgi. Mbe vhɨra nza vharvharigi. Mbe Fhe Bakɨme vuzvugi tɨvi, mbe nta dagasuav, panan za kha gumgi ga kegi.
